pr_title: CATROID-828 - Show supported Catrobat language version number in About

timeline.message:
CATROID-828 - SHOW SUPPORTED CATROBAT LANGUAGE VERSION NUMBER IN ABOUT.

made changes in dialog_about.xml to the add text view
and set the value for the same in AboutDialogFragment.java for showing "catrobat language version". Attaching the screenshot for the same.

Resolved Comments 1 and 2 .

1) The shown text shall be "Catrobat language version:" as a translatable text, i.e., in catroid/src/main/res/values/strings.xml, followed by a space and then the version code.

2) Also, we need an automatic test that checks that the correct information is shown in the about menu.

timeline.author: wslany
